purpleculture_pinyin:
hán
to contain; to include; culvert
содержать; включать; водопропускная труба
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 函 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
内涵 [ nèi hán ]: meaningful content; implication; connotation (semantics); inner qualities (of a person)
涵义 [ hán yì ]: content; meaning; connotation; implication
涵盖 [ hán gài ]: to cover; to comprise; to include
涵养 [ hán yǎng ]: to conserve (e.g. water); self-restraint; self-possession
蕴涵 [ yùn hán ]: to contain; to accumulate; to embrace; implicit condition; implication; entailment

    • 函 [ hán ] correspondence; a case, a box
heisig_chinese_memo: I dropped my letter into the water during the storm on the way to the post office and it ended up in a culvert (enclosed drain under a road).
Ru_trainchinese: hán: (графема) содержать, воплощать; водопропускная труба
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I dropped my letter into the water during the storm on the way to the post office and it ended up in a culvert (enclosed drain under a road).
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water ", the sound of "圅" means infiltration and moisture. "Shuwen": "There are many waters. From the water, the sound. The "Poetry" says: The beginning of the prestige is 𣹢." Tang Dai Shulun "Ti Hengshan Temple": "Luhan pine is wet, the wind swells and the waves float."

" Han " can mean immersion. Emperor Liang Yuan of the Southern Dynasties "Wangjiang Middle Moon Shadow": "Chengjiang contains a bright moon, and the water shadow is like a floating sky."

" Han " also means inclusion and tolerance. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧Qiaoyan": "The first born in chaos, the beginning of the arrogance is both constrained." Mao Chuan: "Han, tolerate."

" Han " also expresses tolerance. Song Wangping's "Tang Yulin‧ Yaliang": "I didn't mean to be connoted by Lou Gong, and Lou Gong did not have any charm."
humanum_short_description_en: From " water ", the sound of "圅" means infiltration and moisture.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「圅」聲，表示浸潤、滋潤。《說文》：「水澤多也。从水，圅聲。《詩》曰：僭始既𣹢。」唐戴叔倫〈題橫山寺〉：「露涵松翠濕，風湧浪花浮。」

　　「涵」可表示沉浸。南朝梁元帝〈望江中月影〉：「澄江涵皓月，水影若浮天。」

　　「涵」也表示包含、包容。《詩‧小雅‧巧言》：「亂之初生，僭始既涵。」毛傳：「涵，容也。」

　　「涵」還表示寬容。宋王讜《唐語林‧雅量》：「吾不意為婁公所涵，而婁公未嘗有矜色。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「圅」聲，表示浸潤、滋潤。

從「 水 」，「 圅 」聲，表示浸潤、滋潤。《說文》：「水澤多也。从水，圅聲。《詩》曰：僭始既𣹢。」唐戴叔倫〈題橫山寺〉：「露涵松翠濕，風湧浪花浮。」 「 涵 」可表示沉浸。南朝梁元帝〈望江中月影〉：「澄江涵皓月，水影若浮天。」 「 涵 」也表示包含、包容。《詩‧小雅‧巧言》：「亂之初生，僭始既涵。」毛傳：「涵，容也。」 「 涵 」還表示寬容。宋王讜《唐語林‧雅量》：「吾不意為婁公所涵，而婁公未嘗有矜色。」
From " water", the sound of " 圅" means infiltration and moisture. "Shuwen": "There are many waters. From the water, the sound. The "Poetry" says: The beginning of the prestige is 𣹢." Tang Dai Shulun "Ti Hengshan Temple": "Luhan pine is wet, the wind swells and the waves float." " Han" can mean immersion. Emperor Liang Yuan of the Southern Dynasties "Wangjiang Middle Moon Shadow": "Chengjiang contains a bright moon, and the water shadow is like a floating sky." " Han" also means inclusion and tolerance. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧Qiaoyan": "The first born in chaos, the beginning of the arrogance is both constrained." Mao Chuan: "Han, tolerate." " Han" also expresses tolerance. Song Wangping's "Tang Yulin‧ Yaliang": "I didn't mean to be connoted by Lou Gong, and Lou Gong did not have any charm."

涵字的基本解释

涵
hán
包容，包含：涵蓄。涵容。涵养（ａ．蓄积并保持，如“涵涵水源”；ｂ．指修养，如“他很有涵涵”）。包涵。蕴涵。海涵。
沉，潜：涵泳（水中潜行，喻深入体会）。涵淹。涵濡（浸渍，滋润）。
公路或铁路下面通沟渠的管道：涵洞。桥涵。

涵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hán］
［《廣韻》胡男切，平覃，匣。］
(1)浸润；滋润。
(2)沉浸。
(3)包含，包容。
(4)宽容。
(5)见“涵洞”。

涵字的英文翻译

◎ 涵
contain, culvert

涵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涵； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页628第13
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡南切，音含。【說文】水澤多也。【揚子·方言】涵，沉也。楚郢以南曰涵，或曰潛。　又容也。【詩·小雅】僭始旣涵。　又【集韻】胡纔切，音咸。詩小雅鄭康成讀。　又【廣韻】胡感切，音頷。【玉篇】沒也。一曰水入船。　【集韻】或从圅作?，从岑作涔。

涵字的源字形

涵字的起名意思

：意为包容，包含，还用于水名，水泽众多。

Basic explanation of words
Han
hán
Tolerant, including: containment. Contain capacity. Conservation (a. Accumulate and maintain, such as "contain water source"; b. Refer to cultivation, such as "he is conscientious"). Forgive me. Implication. Haihan.
Shen, Qian: Han swim (dive in the water, Yu has a deep understanding). Hanyan. Hanyu (impregnation, moisturizing).
A pipeline that leads to a ditch under a road or railway: a culvert. Bridge and culvert.

[①] [hán]
["Guangyun" Hu Nanqie, Pingtan, Xia. ]
(1) Infiltration; moisturizing.
(2) Immersion.
(3) Including and inclusive.
(4) Tolerance.
(5) See "Culvert".

hán
涵
涵
楷
Зная слово.
Cong? (Вода), его древние символы подобны потоку воды; Conghan, буква - это мешок со стрелами, а han - водоем, в котором собирается вода; han (hdn) также выражает звук.
Первоначальный смысл в том, что есть много Мидзусава.
Расширение - включение и терпимость.
D содержит; толерантность: ~ yi "yun ~" package ~. 2 Туннель, через который вода проходит под дорогой или железной дорогой: ~ ворота | ~ труба | ~ мост.
~ Донг ~ Укрытие ~ Ронг ~ Водохранилище ~ Берегите море ~ Внутри ~ Мост ~
